subject: Order #SSN3008
description_text:
Hello,

I'm just curious, what production time I should expect for my order before
it could be shipped?
I found information about 1–2 days on your website, but it's already 5 days
with no updates.

Thank you!

Best regards
Vladislav Bebchuk

conversations.body_text: Hi Vladislav Bebchuk,    We apologize for the inconvenience. The Pro X Ultra P3-H3 and baseplate are currently out of stock at our German warehouse. Since we can only ship to your country from this warehouse, we will need to ship your order once the items arrive at the warehouse by the end of the month. The other products have already been shipped to you. Here is your tracking number. An international shipping tracking number should be updated within the next couple of days.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=ALS01224180696

Thank you for the info! Will be waiting for the updates about pedals on the
next week.

пт, 24 окт. 2025 г. в 13:07, service@simsonn.com

Hi Vladislav Bebchuk,       I noticed your package delivery failed. Please confirm that your address is complete.  Vladislav Bebchuk  Agias Paraskevis 6  apt.101  8046 Paphos  Cyprus  +357 95 116003  https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=885476288283&trkqual=2460974000~885476288283~FX&simplified=true

Hi! Address is correct, it’s just awful Cyprus delivery services, I’m gonna
try to collect package by myself at their office today. Thank you!

P.S. is there are any updates about pedals shipment?

On Fri, 31 Oct 2025 at 11:59, service@simsonn.com

Hi Vladislav Bebchuk,    Your pedals have been scheduled for shipment, but our German warehouse is closed for Reformation Day (public holiday) and will ship your order next Monday. We use DHL Express, and delivery is expected around the 7th.

Hi, could you share with me tracking number if pedals already shipped?
Thank you!

пт, 31 окт. 2025 г. в 12:05, service@simsonn.com

Hi Vladislav Bebchuk,     We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have arranged for your order to be shipped from our German warehouse, but the tracking number has not yet been generated. We will immediately contact our German warehouse staff to confirm the order status.

Hi, I'm finally got a tracking number. And the parcel was sent via regular
DHL, not DHL Express. I've paid for the fastest delivery, and I have huge
concerns about Deutsche Post speed and service quality.  It's already
almost a month I've been waiting my order. Why should I pay extra $30 for
shipping if it anyway will take such a crazy time to be delivered and why
you are saying that it was sent by DHL Express if it not? The difference is
huge between those companies.

[image: image.png]

ср, 5 нояб. 2025 г. в 12:34, service@simsonn.com

Hi, I just remind you, that I paid for the express delivery, and my parcel
stuck in one status for 12 days already. For what I've paid for? For me, it
seems like your employees from Germany just send my package through a
regular post system. It's not normal to take money for delivery and then
use free shipping options instead.

[image: image.png]

сб, 8 нояб. 2025 г. в 00:54, Vladislav Bebchuk <maksim.frei@gmail.com>:

> Hi, I'm finally got a tracking number. And the parcel was sent via regular
> DHL, not DHL Express. I've paid for the fastest delivery, and I have huge
> concerns about Deutsche Post speed and service quality.  It's already
> almost a month I've been waiting my order. Why should I pay extra $30 for
> shipping if it anyway will take such a crazy time to be delivered and why
> you are saying that it was sent by DHL Express if it not? The difference is
> huge between those companies.
>
> [image: image.png]
>
> ср, 5 нояб. 2025 г. в 12:34, service@simsonn.com

Hi Vladislav Bebchuk,    We sincerely apologize for this unusual situation. Typically, DHL shipments take only 3-4 days. We will investigate this matter promptly and provide compensation. We apologize for any inconvenience caused!

Hi, any updates about the pedals? The waiting time is getting really
ridiculous, it's more than a month have been passed after I ordered them...

пт, 21 нояб. 2025 г. в 12:57, service@simsonn.com

Hi! I'm just trying to understand is package got lost, or what happened to
it? I still don't understand why it was sent via regular Deutschland Post
(aka DHL) and not with DHL Express... Previously, I've been ready to order
more peripherals from your website, but after that, I'm really thinking
about looking more on Simagic solutions.

пн, 24 нояб. 2025 г. в 09:57, Vladislav Bebchuk <maksim.frei@gmail.com>:

> Hi, any updates about the pedals? The waiting time is getting really
> ridiculous, it's more than a month have been passed after I ordered them...
>
> пт, 21 нояб. 2025 г. в 12:57, service@simsonn.com

Hi Vladislav Bebchuk,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Our warehouse staff has confirmed that the logistics information has been updated. Please check it.  https://www.dhl.de/en/privatkunden/pakete-empfangen/verfolgen.html?piececode=CE326630378DE&cid=c_dhl_2502061_2353
